name: Subway!
description:
I'm really into rhythm games right now, so I decided to incorporate that into this jam's theme! I hope you enjoy!

CONTROLS: The WASD keys to move in rhythm, and Escape to pause.

I made all the art myself, aside from the end card and the photo that I image traced for the background. Shoutouts to my roommate Nick Byard for helping me with references for the sub! The music is my own as well, but all my sound effects were pulled from YouTube.
